data.name: Warhammer: End Times - Vermintide Last Stand
data.detailed_description:
Feature List

  • New Map: Town Meeting - As repairs of Von Jungfreudsplatz finally reach a close, the Skaven launch a surprise attack on the unsuspecting heroes. How many waves will it take before the heroes finally fall?


  • New Gamemode: Last Stand - Survive wave upon wave of Skaven for as long as you can in the most difficult Vermintide challenge yet


  • Bragging Rights - Keep track of your Last Stand stats on your personal highscore and show off your Red Moon Inn trophy to friends. The more you challenge yourself, the more decorated the trophy gets.


  • Risk and Reward - The longer you survive the Last Stand, the more Endurance Badges you collect. When you finally fall, these are exchanged for experience and crafting tokens.


  • 6 New Achievements - Ready for a real challenge?


About the Game

In this FREE DLC for Vermintide, we give you a brand new game mode called Last Stand as well as its first map, Town Meeting.

It’s time to test your mettle in Last Stand, a brand new gamemode with a single objective: staying alive. With no hope of rescue, the heroes are making a last desperate stand, fighting increasingly difficult hordes of Skaven. How long will it take before they finally fall?

Last Stand

Last Stand is an extremely difficult mode which will put your skills and equipment to the test. You and your team are tasked with staying alive as long as possible, fighting against increasing odds. The longer you survive, the greater your glory and rewards will be, in the form of experience, tokens and Inn decorations!

data.short_description: It’s time to test your mettle in Last Stand, a brand new gamemode with a single objective: staying alive. With no hope of rescue, the heroes are making a last desperate stand, fighting increasingly difficult hordes of Skaven. How long will it take before they finally fall?
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit, Windows 8/8.1 64-bit, Windows 10 64-bit*
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Quad Q9500 @ 2.83GHz or AMD Phenom II X4 940
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or AMD Radeon HD 5770 /w 1GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: *WARNING: 32-bit OS is NOT officially supported at this time
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit, Windows 8/8.1 64-bit, Windows 10 64-bit*
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790K @ 4.00 GHz or AMD FX-9590 @ 4.7 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780 or AMD GPU Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: *WARNING: 32-bit OS is NOT officially supported at this time
